attr.title: Cyber Seraph
attr.desc: A vertically-scrolling shoot-'em-up where you will be facing diverse bosses on your quest to save your homeworld from annihilation. Collect chips from wounded bosses to unlock special abilities and push onward to final victory.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/cyber-seraph), grab the Windows version (Cyber Seraph.zip), extract and and copy the game files into cyberseraph/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/cyber-seraph), grab the Windows version (*Cyber Seraph.zip*), extract and and copy the game files into `cyberseraph/gamedata` folder.
